I am a software engineer with four years development experience supporting military, governmental and commercial programs including the design, development and integration of computer software programs utilizing programming skills.

My experience includes developing web applications using Apache Tomcat as a Web server as well as front end user interface design of Java-based GUI applications. In addition to debugging and developing code using NetBeans and Eclipse as an integrated development environment (IDE), I designed user interfaces using Java as a Web presentation layer that was deployed on the production server in my last Java development role.

I am learning and using PHP in my present role where I am involved in participating in standup meetings with Linux as the operating environment along with relational database technologies such as Lucene Solr and MongoDB. I perform unit testing using PHPUnit. Currently expanding level of knowledge to include mobile application development and design patterns to include class diagrams, sequence diagrams, triggers, database design as well as using the software development lifecycle. Would like to learn Jquery, Struts, Spring, MVC and how to test using JUnit as well as write stored procedures for my next role.

I am also a military veteran, having served in the Navy for six years. I hold an active DoD Secret Clearance and CompTIA Security+ CE and Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 7 Programmer certifications.
